articles.author: jay00
articles.title: Show HN: Transcrib, a speech-to-text Android app for WhatsApp voice notes
articles.description:
Hi,
I made a subscription based Android app to transcribe and read WhatsApp voice notes, supporting all the most common languages. It can be tried for free for 3 days, I'd love to get some feedback!

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30735426…
articles.content: Tired of listening to long audio messages?Forgot your headphones at home?Are you in public and cannot listen to voice notes?Do you need a written copy of information received by voice?transcrib is th… [+704 chars]
